name: LABYRINTH (itch) (Griffonmender)
description:
My first game, made for the 2017 Indie Game Jam in a single month.

LABYRINTH is a simple adventure rpg made with RPGMakerMV, based on the Greek myth of the Minotaur.

You play as Theseus exploring the Labyrinth in search of the creature.

Interesting things about this game:

- Original sprites and art for all characters/monsters!

-Wide variety of monsters to fight in random encounters

- Wandering monsters!

- Three bosses!

- Large maze to get lost in that spans four 40 x 60 maps.

-Amusing item descriptions.

-Ancient Greek Pottery

-Wine!

The whole thing can be played within an hour, though it can go up to two under the right circumstances.

Instructions are in game.

(Use Z to fast forward text.)
